name: Bouncy Arcade (Royster1, DnnyPlus, DevWakz, ByCharlyBoy, LAPURACHULETA, Fratsuki, Burmuruk)
name_original: Bouncy Arcade (Royster1, DnnyPlus, DevWakz, ByCharlyBoy, LAPURACHULETA, Fratsuki, Burmuruk)
description:
Spanish:

Descripción del juego:

Un mapa infinito para explorar todas las posibilidades y tratar de sobrevivir. Personaje con físicas al estilo de una resortera y muchos rebotes. Confronta a tus enemigos al puro estilo de un puck hockey. Spawning en cualquier ubicación nuca para la acción. Enemigos temáticos por horda. ¡que amenazan con matarte.

English:

An infinite map to explore all possibilities and try to survive. Character with slingshot-style physics and lots of bouncing. Confront your enemies in true puck hockey style. Spawning at any neck location for action. Horde themed enemies. They threaten to kill you.

 

Futures:

  • An infinite map to explore all possibilities and try to survive.
  • Character with slingshot-style physics and lots of bouncing.
  • Confront your enemies in true puck hockey style.
  • Spawning at any neck location for the action.
  • Horde themed enemies. they threaten to kill you

Integrates: 

  • Rodrigo Gómez / Project Manager.
  • Carlos Capilla / Game Designer.
  • Ricardo Fonseca / Sound Artist.
  • Daniel Mauricio / 2D Artist.
  • Jorge I. Gortarez / 2D Artist.
  • Fabrizio Dávila / 2D Artist.
  • Gustavo Arreola / Programmer.
  • Ricardo Paredes / Programmer.
  • David Santoyo / Programmer.
